edu.rit.util

Class LongPair<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.util.PairBase<K>
      • edu.rit.util.LongPair<K>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Key data type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable

    public class LongPair<K>
extends PairBase<K>
    Class LongPair encapsulates a pair consisting of a key and its associated value of type long. The key must be an object suitable for use in a hashed data structure; that is, the key class must define the equals() and hashCode() methods properly. The key may be null. Once a key is stored in a pair, the state of the key must not be altered. The value stored in a pair may be changed.

    Class LongPair is streamable. For object streaming to work properly, the key class must be streamable or serializable.

        public void writeOut(OutStream out)
